verses.plain: The preparations of the heart in man, and the answer of the tongue, is from the LORD.

tokens.t: The preparations of the heart in man, and the answer of the tongue,
from the

verses.plain: All the ways of a man are clean in his own eyes; but the LORD weigheth the spirits.

tokens.t: All the ways of a man
clean in his own eyes; but the
weigheth the spirits.

verses.plain: Commit thy works unto the LORD, and thy thoughts shall be established.

tokens.t: Commit thy works unto the
, and thy thoughts shall be established.

verses.plain: The LORD hath made all things for himself: yea, even the wicked for the day of evil.

tokens.t: The
hath made all
for himself: yea, even the wicked for the day of evil.

verses.plain: Every one that is proud in heart is an abomination to the LORD: though hand join in hand, he shall not be unpunished.

tokens.t: Every one
proud in heart
an abomination to the
hand
in hand, he shall not be unpunished.

verses.plain: By mercy and truth iniquity is purged: and by the fear of the LORD men depart from evil.

tokens.t: By mercy and truth iniquity is purged: and by the fear of the
depart from evil.

verses.plain: When a man’s ways please the LORD, he maketh even his enemies to be at peace with him.

tokens.t: When a man’s ways please the
, he maketh even his enemies to be at peace with him.

verses.plain: Better is a little with righteousness than great revenues without right.

tokens.t: Better
a little with righteousness than great revenues without right.

verses.plain: A man’s heart deviseth his way: but the LORD directeth his steps.

tokens.t: A man’s heart deviseth his way: but the
directeth his steps.

verses.plain: A divine sentence is in the lips of the king: his mouth transgresseth not in judgment.

tokens.t: A divine sentence
in the lips of the king: his mouth transgresseth not in judgment.

verses.plain: A just weight and balance are the LORD’s: all the weights of the bag are his work.

tokens.t: A just weight and balance
the
: all the weights of the bag
his work.

verses.plain: It is an abomination to kings to commit wickedness: for the throne is established by righteousness.

tokens.t: an abomination to kings to commit wickedness: for the throne is established by righteousness.

verses.plain: Righteous lips are the delight of kings; and they love him that speaketh right.

tokens.t: Righteous lips
the delight of kings; and they love him that speaketh right.

verses.plain: The wrath of a king is as messengers of death: but a wise man will pacify it.

tokens.t: The wrath of a king
messengers of death: but a wise man will pacify it.

verses.plain: In the light of the king’s countenance is life; and his favour is as a cloud of the latter rain.

tokens.t: In the light of the king’s countenance
life; and his favour
as a cloud of the latter rain.

verses.plain: How much better is it to get wisdom than gold! and to get understanding rather to be chosen than silver!

tokens.t: How much better
to get wisdom than gold! and to get understanding rather to be chosen than silver!

verses.plain: The highway of the upright is to depart from evil: he that keepeth his way preserveth his soul.

tokens.t: The highway of the upright
to depart from evil: he that keepeth his way preserveth his soul.

verses.plain: Pride goeth before destruction, and an haughty spirit before a fall.

tokens.t: Pride
before destruction, and an haughty spirit before a fall.

verses.plain: Better it is to be of an humble spirit with the lowly, than to divide the spoil with the proud.

tokens.t: Better
of an humble spirit with the lowly, than to divide the spoil with the proud.

verses.plain: He that handleth a matter wisely shall find good: and whoso trusteth in the LORD, happy is he.

tokens.t: He that handleth a matter wisely shall find good: and whoso trusteth in the
, happy
he.

verses.plain: The wise in heart shall be called prudent: and the sweetness of the lips increaseth learning.

tokens.t: The wise in heart shall be called prudent: and the sweetness of the lips increaseth learning.

verses.plain: Understanding is a wellspring of life unto him that hath it: but the instruction of fools is folly.

tokens.t: Understanding
a wellspring of life unto him that hath it: but the instruction of fools
folly.

verses.plain: The heart of the wise teacheth his mouth, and addeth learning to his lips.

tokens.t: The heart of the wise teacheth his mouth, and addeth learning to his lips.

verses.plain: Pleasant words are as an honeycomb, sweet to the soul, and health to the bones.

tokens.t: Pleasant words
an honeycomb, sweet to the soul, and health to the bones.

verses.plain: There is a way that seemeth right unto a man, but the end thereof are the ways of death.

tokens.t: There is a way that seemeth right unto a man, but the end thereof
the ways of death.

verses.plain: He that laboureth laboureth for himself; for his mouth craveth it of him.

tokens.t: He that laboureth laboureth for himself; for his mouth craveth it of him.

verses.plain: An ungodly man diggeth up evil: and in his lips there is as a burning fire.

tokens.t: An ungodly man diggeth up evil: and in his lips
as a burning fire.

verses.plain: A froward man soweth strife: and a whisperer separateth chief friends.

tokens.t: A froward man soweth strife: and a whisperer separateth chief friends.

verses.plain: A violent man enticeth his neighbour, and leadeth him into the way that is not good.

tokens.t: A violent man enticeth his neighbour, and leadeth him into the way
not good.

verses.plain: He shutteth his eyes to devise froward things: moving his lips he bringeth evil to pass.

tokens.t: He shutteth his eyes to devise froward things: moving his lips he bringeth evil to pass.

verses.plain: The hoary head is a crown of glory, if it be found in the way of righteousness.

tokens.t: The hoary head
a crown of glory,
it be found in the way of righteousness.

verses.plain: He that is slow to anger is better than the mighty; and he that ruleth his spirit than he that taketh a city.

tokens.t: slow to anger
better than the mighty; and he that ruleth his spirit than he that taketh a city.

verses.plain: The lot is cast into the lap; but the whole disposing thereof is of the LORD.

of the
